mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM zhuan_li t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t2.* FROM ren_cai t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t2.* FROM zhuan_li t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t2.* FROM ren_cai t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t2.* FROM zhuan_li t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t2.* FROM ren_cai t2, business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND t2.emp_name = t1.emp_name AND CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )
SELECT t2.id empId,t2.emp_name empName,t2.lat lat,t2.lng lng FROM business_data t2 where t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT( '%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE t3.id = #{induId} ), '%' )

SELECT COUNT(t1.emp_name) FROM business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId}), '%') AND
CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3)
in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT t1.date FROM business_data t1 WHERE t1.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId}), '%') AND
CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng)

CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3)
in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

AND

CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3)
in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(employee_num) FROM enterprise_data t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.emp_name = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3)
in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(tax_and_addendum)/SUM(business_income_total) FROM 01_lirunbiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.name = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(t1.main_operating_income_thounsand)/1000/SUM(t1.employee_num) meanIncome ,SUM(t1.net_profit_thousand)/SUM(t1.main_operating_income_thounsand) netProfit ,SUM(t1.net_profit_thousand)/SUM(t1.asset_total) aevergeReturn
FROM enterprise_data t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.emp_name = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%')
AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t1.sheng,",",t1.city,",",t1.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(employee_num) FROM enterprise_data t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.emp_name = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(t1.liability_total)/ SUM(t1.asset_total) FROM 01_zichanfuzhaibiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(t1.finance_cash_in) FROM 01_xianjinliuliangbiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(t1.invest_cash_in) FROM 01_xianjinliuliangbiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} )

SELECT SUM(t1.business_income_total) FROM 01_lirunbiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} ) AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.times,'%Y') in (2018,2019) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t1.times,'%Y')

SELECT SUM(t1.net_profit) FROM 01_lirunbiao t1 LEFT JOIN business_data t2 ON t1.`name` = t2.emp_name WHERE t2.tags2 LIKE CONCAT('%', ( SELECT t3.`name` FROM industroy_tupu t3 WHERE id = #{induId} ), '%') AND CONCAT("中国")
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city)
CONCAT("中国,",t2.sheng,",",t2.city,",",t2.add3) in( SELECT mername from region t4 where id = #{regionId} ) AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.times,'%Y') in (2018,2019) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t1.times,'%Y')
select * from business_data where lat is not null
